overview:
Lauren Bigelow has more than 20 years of experience leading pioneering interactive media companies that push online content, self-expression and marketing to the next level.

From mobile and Web-based models, to virtual worlds and social networking communities, Lauren has a proven track record in emerging technology and currently leads WeeWorldâ€™s North American growth strategy, as well as product management and marketing worldwide.

Lauren has held executive positions at emerging technology companies such as Lycos, AltaVista, Mobot (mobile picture recognition) and SkyGo (mobile advertising, now part of Enpocket).

Honored as one of the â€œTop 25 Most Wired Women in Boston,â€ Lauren regularly provides insight at industry events. Lauren earned a Bachelor of Science from Tufts University.
